text: Unifi, UniFi or UNIFI may refer to: * Unifi (internet service provider), a high speed broadband service in Malaysia * UNIFI Companies, the former name of Ameritas, a mutual insurance company * UNIFI (trade union), the British trade union that merged into Amicus in 2004 * The University of Florence * The UNIversal FInancial messaging standard, more formally known as ISO 20022 * Unifi Network, a former division of PricewaterhouseCoopers made up of the Kwasha Lipton Group and its other benefits consulting divisions * UniFi, a wireless networking system from Ubiquiti Networks
title: Unifi
